name: Boing?
description:
Will you boing?

it all depends on you!

Notice!!! this game was made by a stupid 13 year old and his 9 year old brother.

What inspired the 9 year old: "my older brother making games"

What inspired the 13 year old "My brothers initiative to make games because of me made me more than happy to help"

how to install: 

for Linux, download

Boing?.zip  unzip it then open the folder titled balls of steel!

right-click on the executable file then click properties > permissions > "allow executing file as program"

for mac and windows download windows mac and that stuff.zip

unzip then read the document titled README for more instructions.
